DOC.brief_title: Study FG-4592 Correct Anemia New Dialysis Patients
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 18 80 year 2 . Receiving hemodialysis peritoneal dialysis end stage renal disease ( ESRD ) 2 week 4 month . 3 . Hemoglobin < 10 g/dL 4 . Body weight 40 140 kg 1 . Previously receive erythropoiesisstimulating agent 2 . Received IV iron within 4 week prior randomization 3 . Received red blood cell transfusion within 8 week prior randomization 4 . Positive following : human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) , antihepatitis C virus antibody ( antiHCV Ab ) 5 . History chronic liver disease 6 . Clinically significant infection 7 . New York Heart Association Class III IV congestive heart failure 8 . History cancer within past 4 year 9 . Chronic inflammatory disease even remission 10 . History blood disorder 11 . Active hemolysis diagnosis hemolytic syndrome 12 . Known bone marrow fibrosis 13 . Uncontrolled symptomatic secondary hyperparathyroidism 14 . History alcohol drug abuse 15 . History allergy sensitivity oral intravenous iron 16 . Heart attack , deep vein thrombosis , pulmonary embolism past 3 month 17 . Seizure disorder receive antiepilepsy medication 18 . Pregnant breastfeeding female
